name: What's for Dinner?
description: This Flask-React application was created to dicsover new recipes using the ingredients you have on hand, and reduce food waste. This application deepended my understanding of React, and allowed me to use my knowledge of Python.
technologies: HTML/CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, Python, Flask, React, SQL, Heroku

name: Cave-a-vin
description: This MERN application was created with a team to allow a used to discover new wines. It was my first collaborative project with React,and deepened my understanding of GitHub, Git, and working with external APIs.
technologies: HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Express, React, MongoDB, Heroku

name: Relay
description: This application was made to support project management. It helped me deepend my understading of Agile and scrum. It helped me to build understanding of routes, components, and EJS.

name: Two Player Project
description: This is a two player game, created around early ninities action stars. This was the first project I created, and helped me to learn DOM manipulation, Javascript, and Vanilla CSS.
